Verses: 1 dhevane, Purajaadhiyaar Umadhu Sudhandharaththil Vandhu, Umadhu Parisuththa Aalayaththaith Theettuppaduththi, Erusalemai Manmedugalaakkinaargal.
2 umadhu Oozhiyakkaararin Piredhangalai Aagaayaththup Paravaigalukkum, Umadhu Parisuththavaangalin Maamsaththaip Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Iraiyaagak Koduththaargal.
3 erusalemaich Sutrilum Avargaludaiya Raththaththai Thanneeraippolach Sindhinaargal; Avargalai Adakkampannuvaarumillai.
4 engal Ayalaarukku Nindhaiyum, Engal Sutruppuraththaarukkup Pariyaasamum Sakkandhamumaanom.
5 edhuvaraikkum Karththaave! Neer Endraikkum Kobamaayiruppeero? Ummudaiya Erichchal Akkiniyaippol Eriyumo?
6 ummai Ariyaadha Jaadhigal Umadhu Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollaadha Raajyangalmelum, Ummudaiya Ukkiraththai Ootrividum.
7 avargal Yaakkobaip Patchiththu, Avan Kudiyiruppaip Paazhaakkinaargale.
8 poorvakaalaththu Akkiramangalai Engalukku Virodhamaaga Ninaiyaadheyum; Ummudaiya Irakkangal Seekkiramaai Engalukku Neriduvadhaaga; Naangal Migavum Thaazhththappattupponom.
9 engalai Ratchikkum Dhevane, Neer Umadhu Naamaththin Magimaiyinimiththam Engalukku Udhaviseydhu, Umadhu Naamaththinimiththam Engalai Viduviththu, Engal Paavangalai Nivirththiyaakkum.
10 avargaludaiya Dhevan Enge Endru Purajaadhigal Solvaanen? Umadhu Oozhiyakkaararudaiya Sindhunda Raththaththin Pazhivaangudhal Jaadhigalukkulle Engal Kangalukku Munbaaga Vilangumpadi Seyyum.
11 kattundavanudaiya Perumoochchu Umakku Munbaaga Varattum; Kolaikku Niyamikkappattavargalai Umadhu Puyabalaththinaal Uyirode Kaaththarulum.
12 aandavare, Engal Ayalaar Ummai Nindhiththa Nindhaiyai, Ezhaththanaiyaaga Avargal Madiyile Thirumbappannum.
13 appozhudhu, Ummudaiya Janangalum Ummudaiya Meychchalin Aadugalumaagiya Naangal Ummai Endrendraikkum Pugazhuvom; Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Umadhu Thudhiyaich Sollivaruvom.
